member.name: M:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.BearerValidatePrincipleContext.ReplacePrincipal(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Called to replace the claims principal. The supplied principal will replace the value of the Principal property, which determines the identity of the authenticated request.

member.name: M:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.BearerValidatePrincipleContext.RejectPrincipal
member.summary: Called to reject the incoming principal. This may be done if the application has determined the account is no longer active, and the request should be treated as if it was anonymous.

member.summary: OAuth authentication request

member.summary: Must be "password"

member.summary: As supplied by AYOM

member.summary: As supplied by AYOM

member.name: T:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Failure
member.summary: Returned when authentication isn't successful, token expires, invalid token used etc. Should be in JSON but will return in the expected format (determined from "format" querystring parameter or Accept Header or request content type). Refer to https://www.oauth.com/oauth2-servers/access-tokens/access-token-response/ for further details.

member.name: P:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Failure.Error
member.summary: specific error type

member.name: P:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Failure.ErrorDescription
member.summary: Circumstance of the error

member.name: P:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Failure.ErrorUri
member.summary: Optional Uri to Help Documentation

member.name: P:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Failure.HttpErrorCode
member.summary: Error-specific HTTP response code

member.name: F:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Failure.Error_InvalidRequest
member.summary: The request is missing a parameter so the server can’t proceed with the request. This may also be returned if the request includes an unsupported parameter or repeats a parameter.

member.name: F:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Failure.Error_InvalidClient
member.summary: Client authentication failed, such as if the request contains an invalid client ID or secret. Send an HTTP 401 response in this case.

member.name: F:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Failure.Error_InvalidGrant
member.summary: The authorization code (or user’s password for the password grant type) is invalid or expired. This is also the error you would return if the redirect URL given in the authorization grant does not match the URL provided in this access token request.

member.name: F:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Failure.Error_InvalidScope
member.summary: For access token requests that include a scope (password or client_credentials grants), this error indicates an invalid scope value in the request.

member.name: F:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Failure.Error_UnauthorisedClient
member.summary: This client is not authorized to use the requested grant type. For example, if you restrict which applications can use the Implicit grant, you would return this error for the other apps.

member.name: F:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Failure.Error_UnsupportedGrantType
member.summary: If a grant type is requested that the authorization server doesn’t recognize, use this code. Note that unknown grant types also use this specific error code rather than using the invalid_request above.

member.name: T:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Success
member.summary: Returned when initial authentication is successful. Always returns JSON. Refer to https://www.oauth.com/oauth2-servers/access-tokens/access-token-response/ for further details.

member.name: P:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Success.AccessToken
member.summary: The bearer token needed to access the full API

member.name: P:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Success.TokenType
member.summary: Always returns "bearer"

member.name: P:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Success.ExpiredInS
member.summary: TTL in seconds for this token

member.name: P:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Success.ValidFromDT
member.summary: Issue date/time for this token

member.name: P:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Success.Issued
member.summary: Issue date/time for this token

member.name: P:Educ8IT.AspNetCore.SimpleApi.Authentication.BearerScheme.Model.ApiTokenResponse_Success.Expires
member.summary: Expiry date/time for this token
